// Fungsi untuk mendapatkan semua produk
export const getAllProducts = () => {
  return [...actionFigureData.marvel, ...actionFigureData.dc, ...actionFigureData.anime, ...actionFigureData.kamenRider, ...actionFigureData.superSentai];
};

// Fungsi untuk mendapatkan produk berdasarkan kategori
export const getProductsByCategory = category => {
  if (category === 'all') return getAllProducts();
  const categoryMap = {
    'marvel': actionFigureData.marvel,
    'dc': actionFigureData.dc,
    'anime': actionFigureData.anime,
    'kamen rider': actionFigureData.kamenRider,
    'super sentai': actionFigureData.superSentai
  };
  return categoryMap[category.toLowerCase()] || [];
};

// Fungsi untuk mencari produk
export const searchProducts = (query, category = 'all') => {
  const products = getProductsByCategory(category);
  if (!query) return products;
  return products.filter(product => product.name.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()) || product.category.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()) || product.description.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()));
};
